original_title: わが映画人生　黒澤明監督編
overview: Nagisa Oshima interviews Akira Kurosawa, leading him to share his thoughts about filmmaking, his life and works, and numerous anecdotes relating to his films and his various film activities.

production_companies.name: Directors Guild of Japan Production Co., Ltd.

title: Akira Kurosawa: My Life in Cinema
